about_the_game:
This Gorky 17 - Digital Deluxe Content allows players an in-depth insight into a grotesque and dangerous game universe.

GORKY 17 (aka Odium) Digital Deluxe Content includes:


  • Art-Pack consisting of
    • Sketches
    • Wallpaper
    • Poster
  • Sliding Puzzle Game (Windows only)
  • Walkthroughs and Cheats [English and German]
  • Strategy Guide [German only]

content_descriptors.notes: Nudity and Mutant Monsters in the Art Pack

detailed_description:
This Gorky 17 - Digital Deluxe Content allows players an in-depth insight into a grotesque and dangerous game universe.

GORKY 17 (aka Odium) Digital Deluxe Content includes:


  • Art-Pack consisting of
    • Sketches
    • Wallpaper
    • Poster
  • Sliding Puzzle Game (Windows only)
  • Walkthroughs and Cheats [English and German]
  • Strategy Guide [German only]

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics, supported by OS
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics, supported by OS
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card supported by OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Mac Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics supported by OS
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Mac Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics supported by OS
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card supported by OS

name: Gorky 17 – Digital Deluxe Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card supported by OS

short_description: This Gorky 17 - Digital Deluxe Content allows players an in-depth insight into a grotesque and dangerous game universe. The GORKY 17 (aka Odium) Digital Deluxe Content includes an Art-Pack consisting of Sketches, Wallpaper and Poster, a Sliding Puzzle Game, Walkthroughs and Cheats.
